name: gitsyncmarks
description: Your bookmarks, safe on GitHub â€” per-file storage, three-way merge sync, works on Chrome & Firefox. No server needed.

scripts.screenshots: npm run build:chrome && npm run generate-screenshots
scripts.test:e2e: npm run build:chrome && npx playwright test
scripts.test:e2e:smoke: npm run build:chrome && npx playwright test e2e/smoke.spec.js
